alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 20 at 2:02PM PST until December 22 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM WEDNESDAY TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills of 15 to 5 below zero expected on Wednesday, before dropping to 20 to 30 degrees below zero Wednesday Night and Thursday morning. * WHERE...Othello, Ephrata, Wilbur, Coulee City, Moses Lake, Creston, Quincy, Harrington, Odessa, Ritzville, and Grand Coulee. * WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to Noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin
